org.ejvm.util

Class EjvmVersion

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ejvm.util.EjvmVersion

  • public final class EjvmVersion
extends Object

    Utility class to work with eJVM version numbers.

    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Sebastian Nicolai Kaupe

      • currentVersion

        public static EjvmVersion currentVersion()

        Returns the version of this eJVM machine implementation.

        Returns:
        This implementation's eJVM version.

      • fromByte

        public static EjvmVersion fromByte(byte version)

        Creates, if needed, a new EjvmVersion from version by interpreting it as an eJVM version number. If the version number is already known, the existing object is returned.

        Parameters:
        version - The version byte to interpret.
        Returns:
        A new EjvmVersion for every unknown eJVM version, the already existing object for a known version.

      • canExecute

        public static boolean canExecute(byte version)

        Checks if a program with the eJVM version number version can be executed on this eJVM machine implementation.

        Parameters:
        version - The eJVM version the program requires.
        Returns:
        true if the program can be executed on this implementation, otherwise false.

      • canExecute

        public static boolean canExecute(EjvmVersion version)

        Checks if a program with the eJVM version number version can be executed on this eJVM machine implementation.

        Parameters:
        version - The EjvmVersion the program requires.
        Returns:
        true if the program can be executed on this implementation, otherwise false.

      • asString

        public static String asString(byte version)

        Converts the version byte version into a String representation.

        Parameters:
        version - The version byte.
        Returns:
        A readable String-version of the version byte.
